climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: 🍃 ECO-FRIENDLY & Effective: ECO ROOTS Unscented Travel Laundry Detergent Sheets offer a waste-free, organic alternative to traditional liquid detergents and pods. Achieve powerful cleaning and enjoy a natural scent free detergent strip.

😍 A GAME-CHANGER: Our travel-ready, liquidless laundry sheets detergent simplify your laundry routine. Use a full sheet for heavily soiled loads or half a sheet for regular ones. Each sheet equals 2 loads, providing 64 loads per package!

💦 CLEAN CLOTHES, No Mess: Our laundry washer sheets detergent dissolve in both hot and cold water, working great in all washing machines. Pre-measured and lightweight, they pack a ton of cleaning power into a tiny, mess-free strip.

🔎 SMART FORMULATION: Our biodegradable eco friendly products dislodge dirt molecules and stains, keeping them in suspension until rinsed away. An all natural detergent safe, effective, and septic-safe, making your laundry routine more economical.

♻️ COMPOSTABLE PACKAGING: Ideal for traveling and small laundry rooms, our no-drip, no-mess detergent soap sheets, reduce plastic bottle waste. Your clothes will come out of the wash smelling fresh and clean, without any reactions to sensitive skin.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: What are EcoRoots Laundry Detergent Sheets? Laundry detergent sheets are a waste-free alternative to conventional liquid laundry detergents and pods on the market. Unlike these plastic products, EcoRoots zero-waste laundry sheets, meaning they can deliver similar stain-fighting results while being gentler toward the planet. Laundry sheets are a convenient, and effective addition to your cleaning routine. Our laundry detergent strips are safe and effective in all washing machine types, including HE washing machines. With EcoRoots Laundry Detergent Sheets there is no drip, no mess, plus they are lightweight and easy to travel with. Each sheet = 2 loads! Each package is enough for 64 loads! We are on a mission to make low-waste products easy, effective, and affordable. For people & the planet!

Dissolvable & Pre-Measured Laundry Strips One strip does the trick! Super easy to use, our laundry detergent strips pack a ton of cleaning power into a tiny, pre-measured strip of detergent. Our smart formulation effectively seeks out and dislodges dirt molecules and stains keeping them in suspension until they are rinsed away. It makes your laundry washing routine easier, more economical, and much kinder to our environment! No Harsh Chemicals or Dye & Gentle On All Skin Types Our dissolvable laundry detergent sheets are made with plant-based ingredients and natural fragrances using essential oils and plant extracts. No harsh chemicals, no parabens or dyes. So, our laundry sheets are gentle enough for even the most sensitive skin. Choose our Fresh Breeze scent for a freshness you feel or opt for our Fragrance-Free option for a clear and unscented formula. Compatible With Any Washer & Temperature Wash Cycle Our zero waste laundry detergent sheets are safe to use with standard machines and HE front-loading washing machines. They dissolve quickly and are gentle enough to use even when hand washing items. Each of our laundry detergent sheets is perforated to make it easy to rip into two strips. You can use both strips (one full sheet) for a heavily soiled load, or you can rip off and use one strip for normal loads.

Breeze Scent Laundry Sheets Deodorant Cream - Rose Geranium Deodorant Cream - Coconut Deodorant Cream - Unscented Deodorant Cream - Eucalyptus Deodorant Cream - Citrus Product Breeze Scent Laundry Sheets Deodorant Cream - Rose Geranium Deodorant Cream - Coconut Deodorant Cream - Unscented Deodorant Cream - Eucalyptus

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use - no more large plastic laundry jugs!
reviews.reviewText: I received some of these as a gift and was hooked. They clean well, are easy to use (just toss them in the washer), don't take up much storage space and eliminate the large plastic laundry jugs from our lives! You can tear them in half for most loads or use more if you have extra dirty laundry. They are great for traveling or washing by hand also. I used them on a trip when I had workout clothes that I needed to wash in my hotel tub (hotels charge way too much to wash clothes!). They were convenient to pack and I just dissolved about 1/4 sheet in the tub water before washing by hand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good smell, great for travel
reviews.reviewText: I used these when I traveled to Europe. They were great! I was able to put them in a ziplock bag and they took up barely any space. Worked great for quick loads & washing clothes in the sink/shower.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Environmentally friendly and does a great job cleaning my laundry
reviews.reviewText: Occasionally it doesn't dissolve well. I have found that placing it on top of the laundry load, under where the water comes out to fill works better.One other tip, place it on a lighter color clothing, once in a great while it would show up with some white residue on a black garment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Better than the #1 Brand
reviews.reviewText: I first tried a different brand of laundry sheets that is heavily marketed. It seemed fine at first, but I ended up getting a girly infection and read in the reviews that I wasn't the only one. I realized after the fact that that brand was not as eco friendly as I thought (although it is free of plastic). I'm glad they started a movement, but now I'm happier with this product. It's more eco-friendly, and no more infections. I use two sheets or each large load and our clothes seem clean. The product is a little pricey, and I wouldn't mind a fresh scent but it's more important to me that it's healthy. This market seems to have really blown up and I'll probably try other brands, as long as their eco profile measures up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good sheet detergent
reviews.reviewText: I looked at reviews and tried one other sheet-detergent brand and feel satisfied with Eco Roots. Most notable and positive is the dissolubility of the sheets. The other brand I tried did not dissolve in cold water in my washing machine--it left gooey, undissolved pieces. Eco Roots sheets dissolve easily and completely in cold water. I never need to rip them up or dissolve them in warm or hot water. This is a huge plus. I am also completely satisfied with how the Eco Roots sheets clean my clothes. I use one full sheet for a regular load and my clothes come out smelling and feeling clean. The only downside is that they don't come out of the dryer with a nice, fresh-laundry scent--instead they smell neutral. I am willing to accept this because I am sensitive to chemicals and often get migraines, so I'd rather no smell than a heavy chemical smell. I have previously used Method laundry detergent, which I love and which smells great (not too intense), but I am willing to give it up for a more eco-friendly, non-plastic laundry solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for you and the planet
reviews.reviewText: So I have purchased this product more than once, and did not write my review.I would like to state that this product has been excellent on so many levels.First, no plastic containers! Hello earth lovers, what a great way to cut back on plastic.Secondly, this product is a breeze to use...just tear off a sheet, and put it into the washing machine.If you travel, this is amazing...bring your own laundry detergent which takes up less space than a small envelope!It cleans just like the brands in plastic jugs, so a win for you and you can do your part for the environment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Change in formulation? Quality control issue? (No suds)
reviews.reviewText: Always loved these until my last order. These sheets don’t seem to make any suds at all. Mind you, I realize it’s normal not to have as many bubbles as traditional liquid detergent. But now even if I double the number of sheets, I’m hard-pressed to find any at all. Up until now, I would’ve given them five stars. Easy to use, great for travel, can use for hand and machine wash, space saver, unscented, hypoallergenic. All the things. But now I’m not 100% sure if everything is getting as clean as before (feeling confused).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like that there is no plastic involved.Comes in a small cardboard container.Gets the clothes clean.Good product.
